name: Annihilator
description: Deals damage in a large area.<size=20><color=#808080>This is as big as guns get. Yes, it does area damage.</color></size>

name: Assassin
description: Stealth.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A tough but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots at all nearby targets.

name: Armored Scrat
description: These Scrats are surprisingly hardy, maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires 5 arcane missiles in the selected direction. Each missile hits the first enemy in the way and deals 30 damage.

name: Arcane Golem
description: Mystical ranged unit fueled by magic. When its Master casts a spell, it gains +40 health and +6 damage

name: A.I.M. Bot
description: Marksmanship, Shield.This drone has the Automated Intelligent Murder system upgrade.

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 Crystal Sentries with Mana Surge to escort the next Ranged Minion you play.No, not that kind of escort.

name: Arcane Bolt
description: Stuns the highest health ground Minion in an area.If it has 500 or less Health, Destroy it instead and gain Mana Freeze (2).

name: Arcane Ring
description: Mana Freeze (1).8 arcane projectiles circle a friendly Minion. They deal damage to the first enemy Minion they touch.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Banner Man
description: When played, he gives a Shield to the 5 closest Friendly Minions in 8 range.

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: Deals massive damage in a small area.<size=20><color=#808080>A popular UFO weapon.</color></size>

name: Black Hole
description: Sucks up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Blastmancer
description: Spectral Essence.When attacking an enemy that dies, all enemies take 20 damage.A real party killer!

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Only attacks buildings.<size=20><color=#808080>To the untrained eye it might look like he only carries one rocket, but maybe that eye just doesn't understand Scrat technology, okay?!</color></size>

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: Attacks faster for each enemy within range (Max 350% bonus for 5 enemies).<size=20><color=#808080>A big fan of monkey business.</color></size>

name: Blast Entry
description: ERROR_Settsu enters the battlefield dealing [sv:BlastEntry.Damage] damage on impact and gaining a [av:SettsuMinion.MaxHealth] health shield.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description: For the next 6 seconds summon 1 Nether Bat for each mana you spend. Playing it again only prolong duration.Much like mosquitoes, Netherbats are annoying alone, but terrifying in a swarm!

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: Spectral Essence.When summoned, Bahra immobilizes all enemy ground Minions for 6 seconds.His powerful moonbeams spell doom for groups of enemies.

name: Blood Imps
description: Your Master takes damage equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Even in death they're annoying.</color></size>

name: Blue Golem
description: Has high health and high damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Hard as a rock, both physically and emotionally.</color></size>

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an Egg after a short delay. The Boomer explodes on contact or death.Voidborne Wound: Reduce Mana cost by 1.

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives you 2 XP whenever it kills a Minion or damages the enemy Master.

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates 15 XP over 45 sec - regards, XP INC. When in Mana Frenzy the shrine overheats and takes 3x decay damage.

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summons an "Armored" Scrat on both bridges.They gain Haste if you own the bridge.

name: Brothers Of Light
description: Armor of Light.From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army.

name: Border Patrol
description: Mana Freeze (1).Summon 1 Crystal Sentry and 1 Crystal Arcanist.If you have only Crystal Elf units under your command, Border Patrol gains Shield.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from the Book of the Dead

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.Scrat Swarm: Gain Marksmanship.

name: Call To Arms
description: Replace each of your non-master Buildings with a Warrior.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Rolls backwards when it fires.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A roaring streak of lightning that deals damage and causes Stuns. It jumps to nearest enemy within range until it hits 10 targets.

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing 40 damage per sec to unfortunate ground enemies. Lasts 5 sec.

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: Turncoat, RageOnly attacks buildings.This guy also hates buildings, but he may be convinced to hate your own more!

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and give it Rage.

name: Clear Skies
description: Heals all Minions and Masters for 250 health and removes Shield and Rage.

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: Armor of Light.Gain Divine Shield when Armor of Light activates.Empyrean Army: gain Taunt.The fabled commander of the elite VI regiment.

name: Caged Prowler
description: After 20 seconds the cage releases the Prowler and falls apart.Preferring not to face the vicious beasts, Slitherbound typically just activate the cage and run away. Fast.

name: Caber Tosser
description: This powerful Stoutheart tosses his Caber at the first nearby enemy.Revelry: Gain another Caber.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged unit group, low health and damage.

name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.<size=20><color=#808080>Who needs brains when you have a sword this size!?</color></size>

name: Colossus
description: Swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it.<size=20><color=#808080>This lumbering hunk of evil is probably the best at what it does.</color></size>

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Summons Crossbow Dudes over time.

name: Combustion
description: Stun affected friendly Minions. After a delay they explode, dealing damage to themselves and nearby Enemies.

name: Commander Azali
description: When you take a bridge, Azali grants Shield to all friendly ground Minions.Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!

name: Crystal Archers
description: Mana SurgeFragile, but deadly at long range.

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: Mana Surge.Deals damage to groups of enemies.She's read the books of the Crystal Spire for 216 years, now it's time to let loose! And boy is it fun to blow up groups of enemies!

name: Crossbow Trap
description: ERROR_Stealth. Fires bolts at nearby minions.Damage per sec: [math:[av:CrossbowTrap.Damage]/[av:CrossbowTrap.AttackCooldown]]Health: [av:CrossbowTrap.MaxHealth] Lasts [av:CrossbowTrap.LifeTime] secWhen used, this card becomes a [r:DionaDecoyTrap]

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: When killing a Minion or hitting the enemy Master, reduce the mana cost of a random voidborne Card in hand by 1 until it is played.<size=20><color=#808080>Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing.</color></size>

name: Daggerfall
description: Deals low damage in a large area.<size=20><color=#808080>Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!</color></size>

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 75 counter damage and Stuns them for 3 seconds.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has triple health and damage.

name: Divine Warrior
description: Divine Shield.Though she failed her trials with the Chapel of Light, she still picked up a few tricks.

name: Cursebearer
description: Cursed Aura, Spectral Essence.Reanimated in the pits of the Cursed Tundra, this forgotten soul leaves a trail of decay in its wake.

name: Crystal Construct
description: Gain 1 Mana when summoned.<size=20><color=#808080>The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army.</color></size>

name: Crystal Sentry
description: Mana Surge.A versatile fighter.The Sentries of the Crystal Spire train for centuries to master their deadly glaives. They might save time by using a less complicated weapon, but where's the fun in that?

name: Decoy Trap
description: ERROR_Taunts nearby minionsHealth: [av:DecoyTrap.MaxHealth]Lasts [av:DecoyTrap.LifeTime] secWhen used, this card becomes a [r:DionaCrossBowTrap]

name: Disruptor Puff
description: When reaching a bridge and every 6 seconds thereafter, teleport to the other bridge.

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a Flightless Dragon when you play a Spell.Summons a Dragon Whelp instead if the Spell cost 4+ mana.

name: Dragon Pack
description: 3 Dragon Whelps. Highly effective against melee ground Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness</color></size>

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Can fly, which is good against melee ground Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>Part dragon. Part demon. All cuteness.</color></size>

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Versatile but weak flying Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good swat takes care of them.</color></size>

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a fireball, but if the last card you played was a Minion of cost 6 or more, it also summons a Dragon Whelp where it lands!

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: Soul Steal,Call Slitherbound.Starts with 2 Souls.If a friendly Minion has Rage, gain 2 more.

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transfering it to MorelliaUnholy Bargain: Drain 100 health from the 2 closest enemy Minions, transfering it to Morellia

name: Fireball
description: Deals medium damage to Units in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.</color></size>

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Fire Imp
description: Leaves fire on the ground that deals heavy damage to ground Minions in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>A pyromaniac who loves to incinerate his enemies.</color></size>

name: Flightless Dragons
description: Vulnerable, but with extremely high damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Baby dragons play rough. Unfortunately, angering your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.</color></size>

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a Healing Fireball, Fireball or in rare cases, both!Like a certain serpent once said; "Luck iss a ssskill".

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 1 less until played. Does not stack.Unholy Bargain: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 2 less until played. Does not stack.

name: Fergus Flagon Fighter
description: Wielding his famous bladed mugs, Fergus does a wild '''Spin-attack'''. After the attack, Fergus gets dizzy and cannot attack or move for 5 seconds.

name: Frostfeathers
description: Inflicts Slow on attack.These small pesky flyers barrage their victims with hail-like projectiles.

name: Frostfeather Flyby
description: 11 Frostfeathers swoops down to perform one attack on a random enemy minion within the area before flying off.The Frostfeathers move at double speed and inflict Slow.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: Hatches from an Egg after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes Cursed and gains Spectral Essence.

name: Ghost Turret
description: Spectral Essence.Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.The spirits of particularly spiteful beings go into this chalice and out comes the purest form of vitriol.

name: Grenadier
description: Damages groups of ground enemies.<size=20><color=#808080>He set out to make a hair balm, but it somehow turned out so potent it's lethal! Still does wonders for shine and volume, though.</color></size>

name: Guardian
description: Absorbs all damage dealt to nearby Crystal Elf Minions.

name: Gor'Rakk Brutes
description: ERROR_Summons a [actorinfo:Cleaver,[r:Cleaver]], but if the last card you played was a [cv:DynamicDuo.AdditionalUnitTriggerVariable]-mana Spell, also summons a [actorinfo:Rammer,[r:Rammer]].

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: Stuns a random friendly Minion for 5 seconds, then kills it to summon a Cleaver.Keep the sacrifice alive or lose it!

name: Grasping Thorns
description: Untargetable.Enemy Minions who walk through Grasping Thorns are slowed to a speed of 2 and take 20 damage per second.

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with Turncoat: - 7x Swarmers, - 2x Dragon Whelps, - 1x Cleaver

name: Glenn's Brew
description: Give a friendly Minion +100 max health and heal it for 400. After 6 seconds, the Minion mysteriously vanishes if it's still under your control.If the target is a Stoutheart, trigger its Revelry.

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals your Master for 25 health per second.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...</color></size>

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a Cleaver with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 20 damage!Illusory Cleaver looks like a Cleaver to your opponent.

name: Hypnotize
description: Call Slitherbound.After a short delay, enemy minions in the area join your side for 5 seconds.

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Harbinger
description: Has an extremely long range and causes knock-back.<size=20><color=#808080>Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.</color></size>

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all minions to 50% health and summon 2 Werewolves.

name: Haunting Hugger
description: Haunts its target, giving it Cursed and Spectral Essence.When the target dies, the Hugger reappears to find a new target.All it wants in the afterlife is to give everyone a good haunting hug!

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description: Call Slitherbound (2).When Ah'Mun is about to die for the first time, Sacrifice: Heal 75 health for each Slitherbound sacrificed instead.The Eye of Xipetl grants its bearer eternal life. At a cost...

name: High-Mage Leiliel
description: Mana Freeze (2), Mana Surge.While Mana Surge is active, Leiliel protects herself against attacks from ranged units, absorbing 50% of their damage and sending full damage back to the attacker.

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 Plasma Marines anywhere in the Arena.

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 Legionnaires.If your opponent controls both bridges, summon 7 instead.

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Destroy a random enemy Minion or Building.Blink and you'll miss it... 'cause you'll be dead.

name: Living Statue
description: Call Slitherbound.Only attacks Buildings.It's said that if you pick a flower within Apep's mighty gardens, the statues come to life to defend its beauty.

name: Incubus
description: Netherstep towards enemy ranged attackers.

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Zen-Chi cards into your deck.Reduce their mana cost by 1.

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 50% chance to avoid any damage.Gains Haste when summoned if your hand is full of Scrat cards.He's a bit of a showboat.

name: Leiliel's Vortex
description: Mana Freeze (1).Pulls all Minions towards its center, dealing damage to enemies. Damage is reduced the farther from the center they are.

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Magma Storm
description: Calls down 10 magma rocks in a large area. Also deals damage to friendly Units.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Summon and on Death, Morgrul roars and calls 2 Swarmers to his side, damages and knock enemies back.

name: More Dakka!
description: Ratbo charges up for 1 sec, then shoots the nearest enemy for 40 damage per friendly Minion on the field. Reduced damage to Master Towers.

name: Magma Cannon
description: Fires flaming balls of magma at enemies in range.<size=20><color=#808080>For when you need more firepower.</color></size>

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: Empyrean Army: Gain Rage.They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 Mana Puffs at the Master Tower for each team.You can never quite know Puffs will do when they appear - besides look cute!

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: Mana Surge.If you have 4 Spells in your deck, also summon 6 Crystal Archers.The Lord-Sentinel truly leads from the front.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Rage.If there are no other Friendly Minions when this Warrior is summoned, she gains Lycanthropy.

name: Lone Scout
description: Mana Surge.If there are no other Friendly Minions when Lone Scout is Summoned, gain 1 Mana.She works best in a party of one.

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.<size=20><color=#808080>When you crash-land on a strange planet, there's only one rule: Shoot first.</color></size>

name: Musketeer
description: Call Slitherbound.Deflects melee attackers, then ripostes for double damage.

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly ground Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master.Voidborne Wound: Reduce Mana cost by 1.The Shars'Rakk love sharing their magic - and other things...

name: Nether Bat
description: Will sometimes Netherstep towards a random enemy Minion. The optically challenged Nether Bat will ignore targets most Minions would not.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give a random friendly ground Minion in the area Lycanthropy.Can only be played in your own arena.

name: Morgrul's Ragers
description: Voidborne Wound: When Morgrul's Ragers are Summoned, all friendly Minions gain Rage.The savagery of Morgrul's elites inspires others to murder a little harder.

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: Covers a large area with spiritfire, which burns all ground enemies.Accursed Ascension: Enemies that die in the fire join you as Skeletons.

name: Nyrvir Slumbers
description: Deals damage to 2 nearby minions. Gain a '''Spectral Essence''' for each minion killed this way.

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description: Starts as Nyrvir Slumbers in your deck.Impactful Entry, Mythic.Nyrvir breathes spiritfire in a large area. Swap This Card For Nyrvir Slumbers when played.

name: Mountainshaper
description: Strikes all enemies in a large area with an earthshattering Ground Rupture for each charge on Mountainshaper.Mountainshaper gains a charge for every 6 seconds it is in your hand. (Max 5 charges).

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast and only attacks Buildings.<size=20><color=#808080>He hates buildings for some reason. Efficient at deconstruction!</color></size>

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions Rage.A vial of unbridled malice from a thousand demons, with a hint of lime.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a Dragon Whelp or a Warrior or 4 Crossbow Dudes and gives them Rage.

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Quick and weak flying melee Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>Just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!</color></size>

name: Prowler
description: Jumps at enemies at range, dealing double damage.<size=20><color=#808080>This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies.</color></size>

name: Propeller Horde
description: If a friendly minion has Rage, summon 5 more.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: Call Slitherbound.Sacrifice: Gain Rage if you sacrificed at least 1 Slitherbound.

name: The Queen's Dragon
description: ERROR_The mighty [mec:[r:Nyrvir]] enters the battlefield with [mec:[av:Nyrvir.MaxHealth] Max Health and [av:Nyrvir.Damage] Damage (Dps: [dps:Nyrvir])]

name: Poison Strike
description: Inflicts Poison to all enemies in the area.Shower your enemies with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted today!

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small Scrats.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.<size=20><color=#808080>Scrats are the pest of the arenas, no matter how many you kill there always seem to be more.</color></size>

name: Re-Boomer
description: Hatches from an <link="actor_info:ReBoomerEgg>Egg</link> after a short delay. As a Boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.<size=20><color=#808080>Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.</color></size>

name: Red Golem
description: Summon a Blue Golem.If you have 50% or less health, summon a Red Golem instead.

name: S.T.INT
description: Fast and cheap ranged Minion.<size=20><color=#808080>The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - packs quite a punch for its size. Can't take much in return though.</color></size>

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description: Will Cry at 50% health.Though a fierce fighter, Scott is also a little emotional. Don't worry though, he'll be ok and back in the fight soon enough!

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: If the last card you played was a Spell, they gain Rage and Haste.

name: Rock Rivals
description: Taunt.When first summoned, also summon an enemy Living Statue at opponent's Master Tower with Haste.

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card, including other versions of this card.<size=20><color=#808080>The bindings of the Slither Lords are not easily broken.</color></size>

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: Shield.Still a group of weak ranged Minions. Still great friends.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master Tower immune to damage as long as it is alive.

name: Shars'Rakk Twins
description: ERROR_Summon an [actorinfo:Incubus,[r:Incubus]]. If the last card you played was a [cv:DeadlyTwins.AdditionalUnitTriggerVariable]+ Mana Spell, also summon a [actorinfo:Succubus,[r:Succubus]].

name: Screaming Scrat
description: Taunt. Moves toward enemy master until it Explodes and deals damage to ALL nearby Units.Turns out strapping a mine to someone's head is one hell of a motivator.

name: Shadow Whelp
description: Stealth.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Shen Stormstrike
description: Stuns for 2 seconds. If they are already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all nearby enemies when played for 3 seconds.Through years of meditation, Shen has learned to channel lightning directly into the heart of his foes.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a Scrat on impact.Scrat Swarm: Summoned Scrats gain Haste.

name: Sewer Scrat
description: When Sewer Scrat is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts Poison for 5 seconds.Living in the sewers of the great flying city of Bloon has... Side effects.

name: Shock Rock
description: Stuns and damages enemies in the area.

name: Snake Druid
description: Call Slitherbound.His attacks immobilize enemies for 6 seconds.

name: Sniper Scrat
description: Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: Soul Steal.Only the most fanatical Slitherbound are granted insight into the cruel arts of the Slither Lords.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Very long range, but takes a long time to load.<size=20><color=#808080>Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!</color></size>

name: Shieldguard Of Light
description: Armor of Light, Shield Slam.Having an Armor of Light doesn't stop this overly cautious Brother from bringing a shield into battle.

name: Skeleton Horde
description: When summoned, collect 1 Spectral Essence.Skeletons are scrawny fighters, too weak to carry essence, but together they are formidable.

name: Skeletons
description: ERROR_[r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1][mec:[r:WitchQueenPerk2]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk2]

name: Slitherbound
description: Summon 1 Slitherbound Lancer and 1 Slitherbound Darter

name: Slithering Summons
description: Call Slitherbound.Summon a Living Statue, Prowler or Soul Stealer.Sacrifice: reduce mana cost by 1 for each Slitherbound you sacrifice.

name: Stun Blast
description: Stuns enemies in the area.

name: Stun Lancers
description: Their attacks Stuns enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Spiritmancer
description: Spectral Essence.When attacking an enemy that dies, give a random friendly Minion Spirit.

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Gives a random friendly Minion Spirit when killed.

name: Spear Throwers
description: Their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage.

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Gives 3 random friendly Minions Spirit over 9 seconds.

name: Squire Puff
description: Once on the bridge, Squire Puff gives Rage to 5 random Friendly Minions, and then puffs out of play.Affected Empyrean minions also gain Shield.

name: Stormy
description: Shoots Chain Lightning at enemies, damaging itself in the process.Zen-Chi Flow: Double Stormy's health.

name: Spawn of Fury
description: Stuns a random friendly minion within the area, reduce its max Health and Damage by 33%, then summon a copy of it.

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion Spirit.Unholy Bargain: Give 2 random friendly Minions Spirit.

name: Styxi
description: He gets depressed when he misses a kill shot, making him aim carefully for 5 sec before he shoots again! Luckily he's good at hiding.

name: Succubus
description: Netherstep backwards when damaged by melee attackers.The dark sorceresses of Shars'Rakk are able to step through the fabric of reality to safety.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of Swarmers over time.

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.<size=20><color=#808080>Swarmers might be blind, but they'll always smell your fear.</color></size>

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: Heals himself when no enemies are near.<size=20><color=#808080>Not a big fan of monkey business.</color></size>

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and Stuns enemies for 4 sec.

name: Tombstone
description: A tombstone that activates after 10 seconds and resurrects the next friendly minion that dies.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description: Summon 2 Spear Throwsers, If you do not control any bridges summon 1 extra. They all gain Rage.

name: Sun Burn
description: Give all Minions in a small area Rage and deal 10 damage 10 times to enemies.

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an Undying Skeleton.After the second death, its remains linger on the field until..Accursed Ascension: Convert all remains left by this card into Undying Corpses.

name: Troubadour
description: Taunts.He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly.

name: Warrior
description: High health and fairly good melee damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Don't call her princess. She does not like to be called princess.</color></size>

name: Whirly Scrat
description: Deals damage in an area around himself.<size=20><color=#808080>Has a hard time socializing.</color></size>

name: Wizard Puff
description: If it dies, transform a random enemy Minion or Building into a friendly Mana Puff.

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Spectral Essence.Leaves an Undying Corpse the first time it dies.

name: Walking Blind Date
description: Taunt.When killed, it summons a random 4 mana Minion card.

name: Wall
description: Lots of health, but no attack.<size=20><color=#808080>A perfect distraction for building haters.</color></size>

name: Wheel Of Doom
description: Hits ALL ground target in a line 2 times. If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.<size=20><color=#808080>Invented by a madman and infused with magic.</color></size>

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description: ERROR_Summon [cv:WolfAmongSheep.SummonAmount] [actorinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionnaires]]. One of them gains [actorskillinfo:LycanthropyBuff,[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]] at random.

name: Woodsman
description: Revelry: gain Rage and give nearby enemy Minions Slow.As a three-time Mountain Games Timber Champion, he will chop through anything in his path.

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flies over the battlefield towards enemy Master Tower and drops bombs every 3 seconds along the way.

name: Xiao Long
description: Each time an opponent casts a Spell, Xiao Long gains Rage, Haste and Shield.

name: Zap Shrine
description: Stuns the closest enemy for 2 seconds.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all enemies within range for 3 seconds when played.A thousand lightning strikes have imbued this stone with the ability to zap intruders.

name: Wreckinator 9000
description: This metal monster will first slice and dice, then slam and bam. At least until it Self-Destructs.Scrat engineering at its finest.
